sourcesContent:
import {Component} from 'react' import './index.css' class DigitalTimer extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { secondsCount: '00', minutesCount: '25', isTimerRunning: false, timerLimit: 25, } } render() { const {secondsCount, minutesCount, isTimerRunning, timerLimit} = this.state return (

Digital Timer

{minutesCount}:{secondsCount}

Running

Set Timer Limit

25

) } } export default DigitalTimer
